// CLAUDE DEVCONTAINER MOUNTING STRATEGI: Choose the strategy that matches your security requirements

configuration.name: Personal Development Project
security_considerations: All personal credentials accessible in container
Chat history and usage data exposed
Personal API keys available to container processes
Not suitable for shared or team environments

// TIER 2: SELECTIVE MOUNT (Recommended.description: Best balance of security and functionality
// TIER 2: SELECTIVE MOUNT (Recommended.best_for: Team development, shared workstations, collaborative environments

configuration.name: Team Development Project
what_you_get: Default MCP servers (serena, context7) automatically available
what_stays_secure: API tokens and credentials remain on host only
Personal MCP server configurations not exposed
Chat history and session data protected

// TIER 3: NO MOUNT (Maximum Security).description: No personal data exposure, Claude Code still works
// TIER 3: NO MOUNT (Maximum Security).best_for: Public demos, CI/CD pipelines, untrusted environments

configuration.name: Secure Development Project
what_you_get: Default MCP servers (serena, context7) automatically installed
No risk of personal data exposure
configuration.important_note: Claude Code and MCP servers still work - you just get defaults instead of personal customizations

// MIGRATION FROM FULL TO SELECTIVE.description: How to upgrade existing full mount to selective mount

checks: No personal tokens exposed in container

// ENVIRONMENT-SPECIFIC RECOMMENDATIONS.personal_laptop: Tier 1 (Full Mount) - safe for personal development
// ENVIRONMENT-SPECIFIC RECOMMENDATIONS.team_workstation: Tier 2 (Selective Mount) - balance security with productivity
// ENVIRONMENT-SPECIFIC RECOMMENDATIONS.shared_computer: Tier 2 or 3 - depends on trust level and data sensitivity
// ENVIRONMENT-SPECIFIC RECOMMENDATIONS.public_demo: Tier 3 (No Mount) - never expose personal data
// ENVIRONMENT-SPECIFIC RECOMMENDATIONS.ci_cd_pipeline: Tier 3 (No Mount) - use service accounts, not personal data
// ENVIRONMENT-SPECIFIC RECOMMENDATIONS.cloud_dev_environment: Tier 2 (Selective Mount) - assume others might have access
// ENVIRONMENT-SPECIFIC RECOMMENDATIONS.contractor_machine: Tier 3 (No Mount) - minimize data exposure to external parties
